item.title: Azure IaC built for your needs
item.author: p@oczadly.io (Paweł Oczadły)
item.description: Over the years, I’ve had the opportunity to work on many projects and see a wide range of approaches to Infrastructure as Code using Terraform. Some of them scaled well, others didn’t. A few worked great early on — but as the project grew, and new resources had to be added under time pressure and shifting priorities, the codebase became harder and harder to maintain. It was still “infrastructure as code”, but each change took longer, and refactoring became too costly to be worth the effort.
